name: Healthyfied Shanghai Filling
description: Indulge in a healthy twist on a classic filling with our Healthyfied Shanghai Filling. Perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sugar diet, this recipe maintains all the flavors you love. Designed for anyone aiming for a healthier lifestyle without sacrificing taste, our Healthyfied Shanghai Filling is sure to become your new go-to recipe.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the vegetables: Dice the medium red onion, mince the garlic (6 teaspoons), and grate the carrots (260 grams).
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the ground pork (1000 grams) in a large bowl with the diced red onion, minced garlic, grated carrots, onion powder (2 tablespoons), salt (1 tablespoon), chopped fresh basil (2 tablespoons), and ground black pepper (9.2 grams) until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and let the mixture rest in the refrigerator for about 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: After resting, mix the filling again briefly and it's now ready to be used in your preferred Shanghai rolls wrapper or as a filling for dumplings.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
